definition: to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)

sentences.english: I really want to watch "star wars" on the opening day.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想在首映那天看“星球大戰”。

sentences.english: And you probably know that Leicester Square is where all the big film premieres happen.
sentences.chinese: 你可能知道，萊斯特廣場是所有電影鉅作的首映現場。

sentences.english: There's a film premiere for some big movie in Leicester Square.
sentences.chinese: 會在萊斯特廣場上演電影鉅作的首映式。

sentences.english: With opening night only a week away, I was still learning my lines. (learn my lines?)
sentences.chinese: 離首映只有一週了，我還在背臺詞。

sentences.english: And it was all in Trafalgar Square
sentences.chinese: 整個首映會在特拉法加廣場舉行的。

sentences.english: He's got a new movie opening soon.
sentences.chinese: 他的另一部新作馬上要開戰首映。

sentences.english: Let's decide on the guest list for the movie premiere.
sentences.chinese: 我們來決定這次電影首映會的賓客名單吧。

sentences.english: When it premiered at this year's Edinburgh film festival, I paid for Vanessa to fly over.
sentences.chinese: 在愛丁堡電影節首映的時候，我邀請了瓦妮莎參加。

sentences.english: The famous star made an appearance at the movie premiere.
sentences.chinese: 那位著名的明星出現在那部電影的首映日。

sentences.english: The leading actor and the leading actress both showed up at the premier.
sentences.chinese: 擔任男主角和女主角的演員都出席了首映會。

sentences.english: There are many news films releases.
sentences.chinese: 有許多新的片子要首映。

sentences.english: And especially this premiere was huge.
But after the film opened there last week, theater operators said their houses were packed.
sentences.chinese: 但自上週該電影在那裏首映後，電影院均稱座無虛席。

sentences.english: The Spiderman 3 premiere will be held in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 蜘蛛人3》的首映會將在日本舉行。

sentences.english: Wright is chic at the New York premiere of Half-Blood Prince, July 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2009年《哈利波特與混血王子》的紐約首映式上。

sentences.english: We didn't know what the exact turn-out at the LA premiere was going to be.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道洛杉磯首映後的實際票房會有多少。

definition: theater chain (abbr. for 電影院線|电影院线)
